Package com.example.projekat.controller

Class RegistrationController

java.lang.Object
com.example.projekat.controller.RegistrationController
@CrossOrigin("*") @RestController @RequestMapping("/registration") public class RegistrationController extends Object
RegistrationController The RegistrationController class implements methods for registration of new user.
Since:
2022-12-30

    • createUserByAdmin

      @RequestMapping(value="/createUserByAdmin", method=POST) public boolean createUserByAdmin(@RequestParam(name="firstName") String firstName, @RequestParam(name="lastName") String lastName, @RequestParam(name="username") String userName, @RequestParam(name="password") String password, @RequestParam(name="email") String email, @RequestParam(name="role") String role)
      This method is used to create new user by admin.
      Parameters:
      firstName - This is parameter in createUserByAdmin method, and it represents firstname of new user
      lastName - This is parameter in createUserByAdmin method, and it represents lastname of new user
      password - This is parameter in createUserByAdmin method, it represents users password
      email - This parameter represents users email address
      role - This parameter represents UserRole name that user will have
      Returns:
      boolean This returns boolean value indicating whether creating of new user is successfully or not

    • processRegister

      @RequestMapping(value="/register", method=POST) public boolean processRegister(@RequestParam(name="firstName") String firstName, @RequestParam(name="lastName") String lastName, @RequestParam(name="username") String userName, @RequestParam(name="password") String password, @RequestParam(name="email") String email, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      This method call method registrate and forwards params.
      Parameters:
      firstName - This is parameter in processRegister method, and it represents firstname of new user
      lastName - This is parameter in processRegister method, and it represents lastname of new user
      password - This is parameter in processRegister method, it represents users password
      email - This parameter represents users email address
      Returns:
      boolean This returns boolean value indicating whether creating of new user is successfully or not
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException
      javax.mail.MessagingException

    • verify

      public boolean verify(String code)

    • verifyUser

      @RequestMapping("/verify") public boolean verifyUser(@Param("code") String code)
      This method call method verify and forwards parameter code that represents code that is generated when user is registrated. Then method verify check if user with that code exists and change active status to true.
      Parameters:
      code - This parameter represents code that is generated for user when it's registrated.
      Returns:
      boolean This returns boolean value indicating whether user with that code exists or not
